fixes.name: Loss Flag
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau IF [Profit]<0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END to DAX IF. This is a row-level transformation using the Profit column, so it is implemented as a calculated column. Column reference updated to 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit].

fixes.name: Heavy Loss Check
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau IF [Loss Flag]=1 AND [Profit]<-100 THEN "Heavy Loss" ELSE "Normal" END to DAX IF with logical AND (&&). This is row-level logic (no aggregation) so implemented as a calculated column. References converted to 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Loss Flag] and 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit].
